Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Release v1.4.0 - Android widget, global calculation methods, UI improvements

- Add Android home screen widget for prayer times display
- Add 11 new calculation methods for worldwide Muslim support:
  - University of Karachi \(Pakistan\)
  - Tehran Geophysics Institute \(Iran\)
  - Gulf Region, Kuwait, Qatar
  - MUIS \(Singapore\), UOIF \(France\)
  - Russia Muslims, JAKIM \(Malaysia\)
  - Kemenag \(Indonesia\), Shia Ithna-Ashari \(Qum\)
- Add Asr calculation school selection \(Hanafi/Shafi\)
- Add high latitude adjustment settings
- Add midnight calculation mode \(Standard/Jafari\)
- Fix imsakiye modal close button visibility
- Update all 7 language translations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\\Program Files\\Android\\Android Studio\\jbr&& cd C:\\Users\\HP\\.gemini\\antigravity\\scratch\\ramazan2026-native && npx expo run:android --port 8085")
